divs: Sighting DetailsWhile observing the night sky over Vashon Wa. Noticed a star to the south moving eratioally in sky. On closer observation many stars were moving at a high rate of speed. The formation of the big dipper was spinning in a circular motion. Second night, gathered friends and took pictures of very simular activities of these lights. Do not know of any object displaying these capabilities. Bright light, high rate of speed, match constellations but apparently in atmosphere of Earth.
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Fireball, Saturn-like, Sphere, Star-like
